Package org.apache.openjpa.jdbc.ant

OpenJPA-JDBC Ant Tasks

Ant tasks for JDBC OpenJPA tools.

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MappingToolTask
    Executes the MappingTool on the specified files.
    MappingToolTask.Action  
    MappingToolTask.SchemaAction  
    ReverseMappingToolTask
    Executes the ReverseMappingTool on the specified XML files.
    ReverseMappingToolTask.AccessType  
    ReverseMappingToolTask.Level  
    SchemaToolTask
    Executes the SchemaTool on the specified XML schema definition files.
    SchemaToolTask.Action
